name: MULTI VC USERBOTS
description: Just another Telegram VCBot, to stream songs in VC

SESSION.description: A pyrogram session, get this value by running python3 sessiongen.py locally.

PREFIX.description: Userbot Prefix to run the commands. Add your own or keep as default (!)

SUDOS.description: User ID of users who can use commands, split by space.
